pages.title: Trailblaze
pages.text: Trailblaze is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#bf4117)$(l)essence of fire$(). $(br2)It grants the wielder a chance to ignite themselves while also increasing their speed with each successful strike.

It can be useful in battles against enemies that rely on speed and mobility, as the increased speed can allow the wielder to outmaneuver them. $(br2)The fire effect can be a drawback for characters that lack in defences, but the increased speed can make up for it in certain situations.
